columns.text: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach. With outmost respect and love for the environment of Naxos, Apricot & Sea residences are completely integrated in the ancient rocks of Orkos while the soothing sound of waves is bringing a sense of calm and relaxed atmosphere. At Apricot & Sea we are well aware that your vacation is precious and this is why our residences are fully equipped with everything you may need. However in case there is something that can make your stay even more comfortable and enjoyable all you need to do is ask for it. Prepare your senses for magical moments gazing at the endless blue of the sea and sky of our beloved island. Experience Naxos in comfort at Apricot & Sea!

items.description: One of the Top 2 most spacious residences of Apricot & Sea, Maisonette Emery with its 110 square meters provides you with all the space you need in order to enjoy your vacation in full comfort.

items.title: Good to Know:
items.description: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach.

items.title: Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites
items.description: 50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites. The complex offers panoramic views of the pool, the garden and the Aegean Sea. The Naxian Queen constructed following the original Cycladic architecture. It is a complex of luxurious villas and suites that offer all modern amenities. The complex’s pool is great, also operates a children’s pool. Snack bar coffee can enjoy snacks and drinks. In the reception area there is a library where you can rent a book of your choice.
items.excerpt: 50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites.
